Name: }bedrock.server.encrypt.file

Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pSourcePath
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Source directory of file to be processed

Parameters.Name: pSourceFile
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Source file to be processed

Parameters.Name: pDestPath
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Directory where to store encrypted files blank = logging directory
